mapper.select: SELECT TASK_INSTANCE_ID , PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID , CASE_ID , TASK_STATUS , TASK_START_TIME , TASK_END_TIME FROM TB_TASK_RUN WHERE ROWNUM < 10
